Blog.post: Visit this site that I made that shows the shot in the 2004 NBA Playoffs that was supposedly made by Derek Fisher against the San Antonio Spurs, watch my clip of the shot and tell me what you think. urlLink Fisher Miracle
I just added the earthquake, and the dude saying "Welcome to paradise!" and the title to the left that types "WELCOME TO DARRELL's BLOG". I just added the links section on the left.
I'm still bored, and i need someone to talk to me, i just woke up an hour ago, just had lunch and now i'm bored again, IM me!!!!!!!, Please!!!!!!!!!
I just got home and saw the update in my e-mails, thanks for whatever y'all said and for fixing the link, so here is their real link urlLink http://www.xanga.com/gt_gossip

I just added a cool title and added the background music, hope y'all like it. If you have anything that you think i should add then leave a comment. I also made my profile picture a changing picture of pro football players. Also, I added a poll to the left in my nav bar, check it out.

I just started playin my Madden 2004 so that when 2005 with XBox Live Enabled comes out, i can whoop some ass. Other than that didn't do much today, so far, went to Kroger, Best Buy and gonna go to my grandparents house again tonight. Check out the forums y'all, peace.

In response to the GT Weekly blog thing, i have introduced the new GT Forum. That way everyone can talk and discuss the latest news, from Philip's break-up, to Choe's pregnancy. Talk to y'all tomorrow. Almost forgot the link urlLink http://s7.invisionfree.com/MHS_GT .
I just got home from my grandparent's house and i'm gonna do some running/walkin on my treadmill (Jeffery hasn't excercised at all this summer). Anyways read my other posts, they are interesting.

On Maggie and Tammy's blog they state that I am working on a game about Maggie, this is true and there is a site promoting it, urlLink Maggie Games , we have also added the Maggie Jukebox with some songs that we devoted to Maggie.
Maggie and Tammy created a crappy Xanga blog, it's funny though, but they screwed up my link, so here's their site urlLink http://www.xanga.com/home.aspx?user=gt_gossip

I just woke up. Couldn't post yesterday 'cause i went to church, then to my grandparents house until 9:00, we watched the 'horns get beat :( The Astros beat the Rangers, and the San Jose Sabre Cats beat the Arizona Ratlers in ArenaBowl 18 (that's football). We also played some Tripoley (card game) and some bridge and now i'm bored so i just keep talking.
My bro and dad just left for camp for a week so i'm bored, talk 2 me, please........... I was soooo bored, so i started this blog.

well, we're done w/ our first two days of band camp. It was, well, um, fun....., it's hot outside, but nevertheless it was kinda fun. For anyone who wants to know i have not started my summer reading, i am assuming that if u r not a complete stranger that you could've guessed it, but oh well. G/T rules. Geeks rule. Ya, i'm bored, so i'm just talking. IM me please, but not from 8-10:30 or 12-3 on weekdays, cause we have band then. E-mail me or something, please, have not talked to a lot of peeps all summer. DW7777 is SN and urlLink DW7777@aol.com is E-mail, that's simple enough. Talk 2 y'all sometime
I woke up like an hour ago and couldn't sleep any more. i only got like 4 hrs. of sleep. Anyways, my grandparents are coming to Houston for the night. Jeffery it's your pick in the draft.
I haven't been doin much lately but i was bored so i posted.

Well, my cousin and aunt are leavin tomorrow morning so i'll be bored all the time again. Did anyone else see the Home Run Derby, it was sweet, one of the batters broke the record for most in a round and most in a derby, and Berkman from the Astros made it to the finals. Right now i'm watchin the celebrities vs. legends game, watch the All-Star game tomorrow, or watch the World Series of Poker, or watch Big Brother and The Amazing Race, i have some VCRs hooked up so i can tape some things. Also watch ESPN25, u gotta watch something tomorrow night.

My cousin and aunt are still here, family from Austin came up on Friday, it was cool. We've been eating and playing a lot. :) My cousin's goin to the dentist (aka my Dad's office) and then we'll go bowling for a lot of the day, and of course i'll win ;)

We're going to pick up my aunt and cousin from the airport sometime today, and basically spend time with them until they leave on Tuesday. Big Bro is on tonight, watch it, 8 on CBS, maybe 9, not sure.

i watched ESPN25, Big Bro, and Amazing Race last night and taped two of the small money tournaments of the World Series of Poker. I know no one really reads these posts, so i really should shut up now, see ya.

The parade this morning was cool, saw a few people there. My bro and dad just got home from camp, so this week might be a bit less boring. Also on Tuesday Big Bro. 5, Amazing Race 5, and the World Series of Poker 2004 start, so be watching CBS and ESPN.
I went to a practice for the parade at 6:00, we're goin from MHS to Memorial Drive Baptist Church. Go out and watch us.

I woke up at 7:30 and i just had breakfast, i'm soooooo tired, oh well, i'm bored, i'll prob. play some Madden. Watch me marching in the *3rd* of July Parade on Saturday, we're going from MHS to Memorial Drive Baptist Church, i think the whole parade just goes down Piney Point, so watch for us.

I haven't posted in a while due to exesive homework on the first few days of school!!!!!!!!! Anyways, school is kinda fun, band is cool except for the few people that can't march worth shit, i think we all know who I'm talking about, ok maybe not all of u know her, but anyways, her name starts with an L ends w/ an N and Daniel Mata is "going out" w/ her. Although they are "going out" they have never actually gone out, they just talk at school, Daniel has better relationships w/ guys.

first off, i know i speeled it wrong for all of u loser speel good people. I also know that i speeled speel wrong. I bet that we were the only ones that saw Jesus at school today. (Fo' those of u losers who don't know who "Jesus" is then don't even ask) The pep rally was realllllllyyyy ............. cool........ i guess. Actually it was kinda sad and stupid but oh well. GO BAND, GO BAND, all non-band peeps suck, GO BAND, GO BAND, yay!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Band camp is over until Monday night, yay! and then all the practices are in the afternoon when it's really, really, really, really hot!!!!!!!!!!!!! And since i'm so bored, i changed the settings on my comp so i control my cursor w/ my Num-pad, so now i don't need a mouse, only a keyboard. I'm sooooooo cool, i bet that u wish that u were me. HAHA HAHA HAHA, LOL, JK, i'm bored, can u tell, so i'm gonna start my summer reading, JK JK JK JK, i'm not that bored, y'all r sooooo stupid, dum dum de dum de dum dum de dum dum, HEEEEEEYYY YYAAAA! HEEYY YYAA!!!!, OUTKAST, yay!, da da da da, da da da da, da da da,da da da,da da da,chi, boom, HEHEHEHE, OOOOOOOOOOHHHHHH CAANAADAA, OOOOH CAN,ADA chi chi chi chi chi chi OH CANADA chi chi chi dum dum dum
